Shopify Trust Badges Section

Learn how to create a Trust Badges section with Sections Pro in Shopify

Description of the Section

The Trust Badges section is designed to enhance customer trust and confidence by displaying various badges that highlight key selling points such as free shipping, money-back guarantees, secure payments, and more. These badges serve as visual assurances that the e-commerce store prioritizes customer satisfaction and reliability.

Demo of the Section

Installation Instructions

  1. Download the Sections Pro app on the Shopify App Store
  2. Open the app and navigate to Free Sections
  3. Search for "Trust Badges"
  4. Click to Publish or Purchase

Sample Use Cases for a Shopify E-commerce Store

  1. Enhanced Trust: Trust Badges can be added to the product pages to reassure customers about the store’s reliability and service quality.
  2. Boost Conversion: Displaying badges like Free Shipping and Money-Back Guarantee can significantly increase conversion rates by alleviating customer concerns.
  3. Highlight Key Features: Use Premium Quality and Secure Payments badges on the checkout page to underline the key features of your store’s offerings.
  4. Seasonal Promotions: Adapt the badges displayed based on the season or promotional period to align with marketing strategies.
  5. Customer Assurance: Use Satisfaction Guaranteed and Thousand Sold badges on the homepage to build visitor confidence in your brand.

Overview of the Configuration Settings

  1. Font Settings:

    • Override Theme Fonts: Choose whether to override the default theme fonts.
    • Text Font: Select the font for the text.
    • Headline Font: Select the font for the headline.

  2. Text Settings:

    • Text Size: Adjustable between 10px to 50px.
    • Text Line Height: Options ranging from 0.75 to 2.0, including ‘inherit’ for default.
    • Text Color: Select the color for the text.
    • Headline Size: Adjustable between 10px to 50px.
    • Headline Line Height: Options ranging from 0.75 to 2.0, including ‘inherit’ for default.
    • Headline Color: Select the color for the headline.

  3. Colors:

    • Background Color: Set the background color using a linear gradient.

  4. Dimensions:

    • Columns on Mobile: Configure the number of columns displayed on mobile.
    • Max Width of Section: Set the maximum width of the section.
    • Gap Between Badges: Define the spacing between badges.
    • Padding and Margin: Customize the padding and top margin for elements within the section.

  5. Content Settings:

    • Text Alignment: Choose the alignment of text (left, center, right, or justify).
    • Headline: Enter the text for the headline.
    • Text: Enter the supporting text below the headline.

  6. Badge Display Options:

    • Free Shipping: Toggle the visibility of the Free Shipping badge.
    • Money Back: Toggle the visibility of the Money-Back Guarantee badge.
    • Secure Payments: Toggle the visibility of the Secure Payments badge.
    • Award Winning: Toggle the visibility of the Award-Winning badge.
    • Premium Quality: Toggle the visibility of the Premium Quality badge.
    • Five Star: Toggle the visibility of the Five Star badge.
    • Fast Shipping: Toggle the visibility of the Fast Shipping badge.
    • Thousand Sold: Toggle the visibility of the Thousand Sold badge.
    • Satisfaction Guaranteed: Toggle the visibility of the Satisfaction Guaranteed badge.
    • Guaranteed Quality: Toggle the visibility of the Guaranteed Quality badge.
    • Exclusive: Toggle the visibility of the Exclusive badge.
    • Inspected: Toggle the visibility of the Inspected badge.
    • Made in USA: Toggle the visibility of the Made in USA badge.
    • Made in Canada: Toggle the visibility of the Made in Canada badge.
